full_summary:
================/
**Government Tender Announcement**
-------------------------------

**Tender Title**
---------------

Options for Identifying Critical Habitat for Barren-ground Caribou in Canada

**Reference Number**
------------------

PW-23-01025121

**Publication Date**
------------------

February 8, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**
------------------

February 23, 2023 at 5:00 PM EST

**Overview**
------------

The Canadian Wildlife Service (CWS) seeks the services of a contractor to identify preliminary options for critical habitat (CH) designation for barren-ground caribou (BGCA) in Canada, in the event of listing. The contractor will be required to:

* Review relevant documents and gather published and unpublished information
* Determine suitable methods and approaches for CH identification
* Provide examples of how Indigenous Knowledge can be incorporated into the CH identification process
* Identify knowledge gaps in both scientific and traditional knowledge

**Desired Qualifications**
-------------------------

The successful contractor will possess:

* Expertise and experience in environmental impact studies and other environmental assessments
* Familiarity with Indigenous Knowledge and traditional practices
* Access to necessary equipment and resources

**Contracting Entity**
---------------------

Environment Canada

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* Name: Angelina Garcia
* Email: [Angelina.Garcia@ec.gc.ca](mailto:Angelina.Garcia@ec.gc.ca)
* Phone: 778-726-1680

**Attachments**
--------------

* English RFP document: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/08/4e2d0bc60591ebd4ef218f7c6098ed72/5000068207_rfp_en_tma.pdf
* French RFP document: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/08/ed4d5f96ffd56b2a153f7a9132970ba7/5000068207_rfp_fr_tma.pdf

Note:
-----

This tender announcement is now expired and is no longer accepting submissions. Please refer to the attachments for full RFP details.
